scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: In this letter, Nicholas Vachel Lindsay, Springfield, Illinois writes to Edwin Markham, West New Brighton, New York, and expresses his regret at being unable to attend the poetry reading for the benefit of the Mary Fisher Home; will probably see him at the Poetry Society in February or March; and indicates that he can be reached at that time via the Brevcort Hotel. TLS.
